N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 43.1 - Vehicles subject to law

State Regulations
(a) This Part shall apply to all motor vehicles and trailers except motorcycles and
limited use motorcycles. (b) Side
view mirrors shall not be considered in determining whether a vehicle is more
than 80 inches in width. (c) A
trailer or semitrailer is exempt from headlamps, parking lamps, directional
signals, and highway hazard warning lamps or reflectors on the front. (d) Agricultural equipment consists of
agricultural tractors, self-propelled implements of husbandry, and towed, mounted or semi-mounted implements of husbandry. Implement of husbandry shall
mean a vehicle designed or adapted exclusively for agricultural, horticultural
or livestock raising operations or for lifting or carrying an implement of
husbandry. Agricultural equipment lighting requirements are contained in
section
43.9
of this Part. Notes
